page.title: 10KIRKCOWAN FOOTBALL CLUB
page.content: Tarff Rovers football club has been going for over a century.The football{ {pitch}was{donated}by{Major Hamilton}to be used as long as there was a football club.They have to abide the SFA rules.Meetings are held at the football field.Up until recently they often won but now they usually lose.They have played in several{major {matches,}winning the Qualifying Cup against Kirkcudbright.The furthest away they have played was Inverness. Travelling spectators help to pay the bus.People in Newton Stewart wash the strips.The team doesn't practice before the match as there are only{3} boys from{Kirkcowan}in the team.They have fund raising efforts such as discos.Every year they have a{player} of{year}award.The club buys the footballs and pays the referee Â£10 every Saturday.
